parameter.name: rpsdb-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: rpsdb Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: crrhkdw-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: crrhkdw Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultvalue: Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=172.16.4.6;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=dwroot;Password=root1234*;Initial Catalog=CRRHKDW

parameter.name: CRRHKDWConnectionString-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: CRRHKDWConnectionString Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
